title: Astroboy 12
creator_credit: Del Lewis, Carl Battaglia, Nihon Terebi and Tezuka Productions
brief_description: Three epsiodes of the adventures of the boy robot Astro created by Osamu Tezuka. The titles include: “Speeding through the storm”; the D51 steam engine saves the day when Astro and his class mates are on a field trip: “The Rainbow comet”; Astro is blackmailed into joining the forces of evil when Atlas’ Crystal Castle kidnap Daddy Walrus’ class; “The Robots nobody wanted”; Astro assists three robots- a fireman, a nurse, and a welder who prove that they are worth more than scrap metal.
creator_credit_for_label: Del Lewis, Carl Battaglia, Nihon Terebi and Tezuka Productions
